allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Add ESLint/Prettier, structured logging, and code quality fixes

- Add ESLint + Prettier configuration with scripts \(lint, format\)
- Create logger.js for structured logging with levels \(DEBUG/INFO/WARN/ERROR\)
- Replace console.log with logger in production files
- Fix all 104 ESLint errors \(regex escapes, var->let, undefined vars\)
- Update CLAUDE.md with complete project documentation
- Format entire codebase with Prettier
- Exclude debug/test scripts from lint rules

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
